articles.title: Japan, Italy to lift defense ties amid China, Russia worries - The Washington Post
articles.description: Japanese Defense Minister Nobuo Kishi says he and his Italian counterpart agreed to step up military cooperation as Japan expands security ties with Europe amid concern about Russia’s invasion of Ukraine and its impact on Asia

articles.title: Pan Lingling sheds 10kg, doesn't want her health to be a burden to her kids - AsiaOne
